TopicTitle: Enable all new modules from a plugin in Career mode

Articles.Content:
Greetings

I got quite a few saves with my science tree fully researched, and whenever I install a new addon (say KAS or Firespitter) I have to go through every science tree in my games enabling one by one every single little new module that the addon has (every connector, new piece of equipment, in different science stages....).

Saying this is time consuming is an understatement. This is even worse if I were to install nova punch or KW rocketry.

Is there a way to enable them all in one shot? Say via save files? If so , what are the files I have to modify? ( persistent.sfs and tree.cfg don't seem to have information about addon's modules).

Thank you very much.

Edited May 22, 2014 by jebodiah1976

I'm not entirely sure, as I don't muck about with the files a whole lot. My recommendation would be to have all of the mods you want present before you begin the Career mode, or, if you must get more and more, I would recommend just doing it on Sandbox.

I'm not entirely sure, as I don't muck about with the files a whole lot. My recommendation would be to have all of the mods you want present before you begin the Career mode, or, if you must get more and more, I would recommend just doing it on Sandbox.

Thanks for the suggestion, but that's not what I asked. If I wanted to start all over again I would have done it already and not create a new thread about it.

This is like I'm asking "help me fix my car" and you tell me "I don' t know , maybe take a bus to go places".

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78067-0-23-5-Research-Them-All-1-1-(April-30)

That's exactly what I was looking for. Thank you kindly.
